Package it.polimi.se2019.commons.mv_events

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllowedMovementsEvent
    This event sends the user the list of positions they can move their target to.
    AllowedWeaponsEvent
    This event send the user the weapons they own and that are reloaded.
    BoardRefreshEvent
    This event is sent to the user in order to substitute the grabbed cards at the end of each turn.
    DisablePowerUpEvent
    This event is sent to the user in order to deactivate a power up that cannot be used any longer.
    DrawnPowerUpEvent
    This event is sent to all users to notify that a user drew a power up.
    EndOfMatchEvent
    This event is sent to all players when the match is over and the final points have been calculated.
    FinalFrenzyStartingEvent
    This event notifies all users when the last skull is removed from the killshot track and only in case final frenzy is activated.
    FinanceUpdateEvent
    This event notifies all users when the number of ammos owned by a player changes.
    GrabbablesEvent
    This event is sent to the user to ask them what they wish to grab.
    GrabbedLootCardEvent
    This event notifies all users when a loot card is grabbed.
    GrabbedWeaponEvent
    This event is sent to notify all users that a weapon was grabbed.
    HandshakeEndEvent
    This event communicates the users connected and playing and the map configurations available which were generated from the JSON files upon initialization of the game class.
    MatchConfigurationEvent
    This event notifies all users of the available configurations and of the players connected.
    MVCardEndEvent
    This event is sent whenever a card is over and cannot be used any longer.
    MVChooseAmmoToPayEvent
    This event sends the user the ammos available to pay for the price of a power up.
    MVDeathEvent
    This event is sent after the death of a player and notifies everyone of who killed them.
    MVDiscardPowerUpEvent
    This event is sent when a user discards a power up and everyone is notified.
    MVEndOfTurnEvent
    This event notifies all users that playerEnding has just finished playing and playerStarting is about to start.
    MvJoinEvent
    This event notifies all users when a new user enters the game.
    MVMoveEvent
    This event notifies all users when a player is moved.
    MVRespawnEvent
    This event is sent to a dead player when they have to respawn and a power up card is drawn for them.
    MVSelectionEvent  
    MVSellPowerUpEvent
    This event is sent when ammos are not enough to pay for the price of an action but the power ups owned by the author could cover the said price.
    MVWeaponEndEvent
    This event notifies the user that their weapon is over and cannot be used any longer.
    PartialSelectionEvent
    This event notifies the user of the target set, whether this effect can be skipped and whether the card is a weapon or a power up.
    PausedPlayerEvent
    This event notifies all users whenever a player is paused.
    PossibleEffectsEvent
    This event communicate to the user the possible effects they can use with the chosen card.
    PowerUpToLeaveEvent
    This event asks the user which power up they wish to leave.
    ReloadableWeaponsEvent
    This event communicates the user the reload prices of the weapons.
    SetUpEvent
    This event notifies all users about the final set up of the game.
    StartFirstTurnEvent
    This event notifies the first user of the match that their turn is starting and sends them two power ups to spawn.
    SyncEvent
    This event allows users to obtain all the missing information whenever they reconnect.
    TimerEvent
    This event notifies the ticking of a timer.
    TurnEvent
    This event communicates the user which combination of actions can be chosen by the player.
    UnpausedPlayerEvent
    This event notifies the user when a player is unpaused.
    UpdateHpEvent
    This event notifies all users when the hp of a player is updated, communicating the name of the player that attacked them.
    UpdateMarkEvent
    This event notifies all users whenever a player's marks are updated.
    UpdatePointsEvent
    This event notifies all users whenever a player's points are updated.
    UsablePowerUpEvent
    This event communicates a user that one of their power ups can be used and whether it costs.
    UsernameDeletionEvent
    This event communicates everyone whenever a user disconnects.
    WeaponToLeaveEvent
    This event communicates the users which weapons they own in order for them to choose one to discard.
